attributes.action: Insist that all UK service personnel be given the right to sell their stories to the media, as long as it does not breach the Official Secrets Act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should service personnel be treated differently to other members of society.  They earn a pittance, put their lives at risk and generally get treated very poorly (e.g. poor accomodation, high risk of family breakdown etc.)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
